Description: The Northern Ireland Housing Statistics report is an annual compendium of statistics containing information on a range of areas relating to housing. The report is divided into sections covering: Energy.
Name: Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18: Energy
Notes: Source: NIHE, NI House Condition Survey
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified as an Excel file entitled Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18 Section 2 Tables - Energy under heading Documents.
Sizing Notes: Compendia of 5 tables with no obvious commonality.
